评论详情: As the title says, it does show every curve, similar to the one in black…. Even the ones you don’t want showing…. And panty lines. It is a cute and stretchy dress but can be unflattering if you don’t want every roll to show. I haven’t tried it with shape wear and maybe that will make a big difference. But for the price I paid for preloved I can’t complain. It can be a cute maternity dress for when you start showing as it did look cute with my food baby bloated belly.
I returned this dress. It ran small and was made of a see through material.
